dummy_var.description: Specify the type so that the variables can be configured in the frontend. If a default value is needed, specify it as default_val.

string_var.description: A string variable to be configured by the user; this description should explain what it's for.

array_var.description: Some array of strings, such as URLs, emails, etc.

array_of_objects_var.description: Objects or arrays of objects require the schema to be present as below. Validation only goes one level deep.
